channel.title: dotnet on A6k
channel.description: Recent content in dotnet on A6k

item.title: Testhost process exited with error
item.description: Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestPlatform.ObjectModel.TestPlatformException Testhost process exited with error It was not possible to find any compatible framework version The framework ‘Microsoft.NETCore.App’, version ‘2.2.0’ was not found.

item.title: ConfigureAwait FAQ
item.description: Stephen Toub - One aspect of async/await that continues to draw questions is ConfigureAwait. In this post, I hope to answer many of them. I intend for this post to be both readable from start to finish as well as being a list of Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) that can be used as future reference.

item.title: Distinct - Doesn’t work the way you think it does
item.description: IEqualityComparer<!-- raw HTML omitted --> is a “hash code provider”

item.title: WebAPI - AddWithoutValidation method not found
item.description: If you are using WebAPI and have recently installed VS2012. Your WebAPI stuff will be broken. Your controller method will be called then you’ll just get a 500 response.

item.title: Hidden Features of C#?
item.description: This is kind of a meta answer that lists a set of answers related to features/keywords
